name: Summer Lunch Program
short_desc: Provides free meals to children during summer vacation at 7 community-based sites
description: Provides free meals to children during summer vacation. Open to all children 18 and under. No application or registration required. Walk-in lunch and snack times vary. Call for more information.                                                                                                                Summer Food sites offer recreational activities at all seven locations in the City of Berkeley.                                                                      Site Locations: Call for Summer 2014 sites.
